body: The most typical japanese main character right there, it's got the brown hair, that most common hairstyle, brown/black eyes the skin is several shades darker then the females, has that "innocent makoto-kun" face, comes off as an herbivore until the sex part happens then it's like a shift personality gears thing, high schoolboy, 2+ females (always at least 2 from the get go, often one of them being "childhood friend" bonus points if nextdoor neighbor girl too) pinning for mc crap going on, girls are not just any girls, no, they're either disgustingly rich, top student geniuses, magical girls, assassin girl, ninja girl, soldier girl, power fantasy western foreign imports "knight" girl, princess of some place (often some remote european location, but they never go into too much detail about unless the plot calls for it), alien girl (or from another world, bonus points if its also a friggin princess or some form of most special snowflake of its race/origin). It's always the same gook shit.
